title: Am I Boring You? (Ep. 225 Rebroadcast)
description: Researchers are trying to figure out who gets bored — and why — and what it means for ourselves and the economy. But maybe there’s an upside to boredom?
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
